title: A Testimony Of God's Working And The Call To The Work
description: Brother Merle shares about the working of the Lord in his local area. This message is a call to pray for the gathering of believers in local areas that would be used in revival for God's work. He calls us to personal revival and then to go forward in God's work to a lost and dying world without Christ and the testimony of His bride.

title: The Invitation
description: Do you know what Christ's claim is on your life?  Have you been born from above?  Do you have the vital signs in your life or just a birth certificate?  You must have both.  Is there reality in your life?

title: The Underground Church of America
description: Brother Merle shares a great burden for the Church in North America towards the reality of an underground Church and coming persecution. He shares that if we do not have a passionate love relationship with Jesus we will not stand during times of persecution. God is preparing now servant leaders for His Bride, His underground Church in America.
